sentences.en: I have more pressing things to attend to.
sentences.cn: 我有更紧迫的事情要做.

sentences.en: It is one of the most pressing problems facing this country.
sentences.cn: 这是该国面临的最紧迫的问题之一。

sentences.en: Many parents have been pressing for an inquiry into the problem.
sentences.cn: 许多家长迫切要求调查这个问题.

sentences.en: Night was already pressing in as we reached the small town.
sentences.cn: 当我们抵达那个小镇的时候,夜幕已经降临了.

sentences.en: Police have announced they will not be pressing charges.
sentences.cn: 警方已宣布不会提起诉讼。

sentences.en: Pressing business matters prevented him from taking a holiday.
sentences.cn: 他因商务上有紧迫事情而不能去度假.

sentences.en: Shoes are pressing on my toes.
Something has been pressing on my leg and it tingles.
The CD, released in October, sold out a first pressing of 1,500 in just four months.
sentences.cn: 这张光盘发行于10月份，第一批压制的1,500张仅仅四个月就销售一空。

sentences.en: The churning, pressing crowds made her feel claustrophobic.
sentences.cn: 挤来挤去的密集人群使她感到一种透不过气的恐惧。

sentences.en: The night was pressing up against the windows.
The proposal was temporarily tabled due to more pressing business.
sentences.cn: 由于有更紧急的事务,该项议案暂缓审议.

sentences.en: The rent collector is pressing for payment again.
sentences.cn: 收租人又来催促交租了.

sentences.en: There were two main political groupings pressing for independence.
sentences.cn: 有两大主要的政治团体要求独立。

sentences.en: They were pressing on eastwards towards the city's small airfield.
sentences.cn: 他们继续向东朝该市的小机场推进。

words.tran_cn: 加压的；有使血压增高的；收缩血管的
压；按；新闻；出版社；[印刷] 印刷机
增压；密封；使…加压（pressurize的过去式）
密封；增压；使……加压，使……压入

phrases.tran_cn: 热等静压；高温等静力压制
n. 等静压制；等静压成形；等压压制；均压法

trans.tran_cn: 紧迫的，紧急的，迫切的，急迫的，恳切的
trans.tran_en: needing to be discussed or dealt with very soon

trans.tran_cn: 压，压制，模压制品，力主，唱片
trans.tran_en: a thing or group of things, especially records or CDs, that have been made by pressing plastic or metal into shape
